text: T. Velmurugan is a Tamil Nadu politician . He is a former Member of the Legislative Assembly of the state. He was elected to the Tamil Nadu legislative assembly as a Pattali Makkal Katchi candidate from Panruti constituency in 2001, and 2006 elections. He is often considered to be Tamil Nationalist. He is the founder of the party Tamizhaga Vazurimai Katchi (TVK). ==Reference== Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: T. Velmurugan
